lyrics:
9 contributorswhat’s best for you lyricsverse 1
don’t make this hard for me
it’s not about who’s right or wrong no
if it’s how it’s supposed to really supposed to be
then this love will carry on girl
if we leave how we began
then just know that

chorus
i only want what’s best for you
it’s not what’s good for me
it’s not about what i want
but it’s all about what you need
i want what’s best for you
but i don’t want you to leave
it’s not about what i want
but it’s all about what you need i want what’s best for you

verse 2
cause youre the sweetest thing i know
if i said i loved you really loved you so
then i could let you go
girl doesnt mean im giving up no
so just know that

chorus
i only want what’s best for you
it’s not what’s good for me
it’s not about what i want
but it’s all about what you need
i want what’s best for you
but i don’t want you to leave
it’s not about what i want
but it’s all about what you need i want what’s best for you
see trey songz liveget tickets as low as 87you might also likebridge
i want whats best for you dont matter how bad it feels
dont matter how much it hurts you deserve your worth
i only want whats best i dont wanna tell no lies
i dont wanna make you cry i only want whats best

chorus
i only want what’s best for you
it’s not what’s good for me
it’s not about what i want
but it’s all about what you need
i want what’s best for you
but i don’t want you to leave
it’s not about what i want
but it’s all about what you need i want what’s best for you
i only want what’s best for you
it’s not what’s good for me
it’s not about what i want
but it’s all about what you need
i want what’s best for you
but i don’t want you to leave
it’s not about what i want
but it’s all about what you need i want what’s best for you

outro
whats best for you
only want whats best for you
only want whats best for you
only want whats best for you
only want whats best
only want whats best
only want whats best
only want the best for you21embed
